planet.name: Kepler-1514 b
Gaia DR2 2051866238502437632 b
KOI-3681 b
KIC 2581316 b
TYC 3135-497-1 b
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Morton et al. 2016. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Morton et al. 2016 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

planet.name: Kepler-1514 c
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Armstrong et al. 2020. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Armstrong et al. 2020 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
